headline: Fortinet Boosts FortiRecon With CTEM to Strengthen Cyber Defenses
summary: FTNT enhances FortiRecon with CTEM alignment, brand protection and AI-driven automation to tackle evolving cyber threats.

headline: Fal.Con 2025 Shatters Records for Growth, Attendance and Demand as CrowdStrike Leads Cybersecurity into the Agentic AI Era
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, August 15, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced record-breaking momentum for its flagship conference Fal.Con, which has sold out faster than ever and is poised to deliver unprecedented growth across every key metric. From September 15 - 18, more than 8,000 attendees from over 65 countries and 25 industries will converge at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas.
